We know you already know that, which is probably why you're here, checking out our guide to the best sandals and summer shoes Amazon has to offer. The retailer is one of our favorite places to find shoes of all kinds (including heels, sneakers, and even designer shoes) when we're in a pinch and need that two-day shipping or when we want to cut back on spending and get savvy. Ahead, we've rounded up the 15 best pairs of sandals from Amazon for summer. We scoured the brand's bestselling sandals page to find the ones that will serve you best, from strappy sandals and braided styles to waterproof pillow slides and a block-heeled option for those who like a little extra height. We included a range of prices, too, starting at $14. Keep scrolling to shop our selects.

html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Sandals and summer go hand-in-hand, just like ice cream and beach days, or, since we're talking fashion, flowy dresses and bikinis. But buying new ones yearly — or even replacing worn-out pairs — can get expensive. We know you already know that, which is probably why you're here, checking out our guide to the best sandals and summer shoes Amazon has to offer. The retailer is one of our favorite places to find shoes of all kinds (including heels, sneakers, and even designer shoes) when we're in a pinch and need that two-day shipping or when we want to cut back on spending and get savvy.

Ahead, we've rounded up the 15 best pairs of sandals from Amazon for summer. We scoured the brand's bestselling sandals page to find the ones that will serve you best, from strappy sandals and braided styles to waterproof pillow slides and a block-heeled option for those who like a little extra height. We included a range of prices, too, starting at $14. Keep scrolling to shop our selects.

Best Flip-Flops

KuaiLu Flip Flops ($14, originally $20)

As much as we love a classic pair of Old Navy flip-flops, this bestselling pair on Amazon is a more elevated take on the look. Thousands of people have described them as equal parts comfortable and stylish.

Best Thong Sandal

Amazon Essentials Women's Thong Sandal ($17)

If you're looking for a classic pair of thong sandals that cost less than some people's Starbucks orders, these are a must have. They come in several colors, but we're big fans of this black faux leather pair because they'll complement everything in your wardrobe.

Best Gladiator Sandals

Dream Pairs Elastic Ankle Strap Flat Sandals ($19, originally $27)

These gladiator sandals have elastic straps that are comfortable on your feet, which isn't always the case with faux or genuine leather versions of the style. They're lightweight and timeless, perfect for pairing with everything from summer dresses to shorts and tees.

Best Pillow Slides

Cushionaire Women's Feather Cloud Recovery Slide Sandals with +Comfort ($20, originally $35)

Pillow slides are ideal for beach or pool days because they're made of waterproof EVA, a super cushy plastic material. But these comfy sandals have won fans for all kinds of activities. As one happy shopper put it, "These are the most comfortable slides I've had in years," a sentiment echoed by countless others.

Best Braided Sandals

Dream Pairs Square Open Toe Slide Sandals ($23, originally $32)

How cute are these braided strap square-toe sandals? They come in neutral colors for all you minimalists, as well as a hot pink hue for those who love a bold statement.

Best Ankle Strap Sandals

Dream Pairs Ankle Strap Sandals ($23)

Don't these ankle strap sandals look like they should cost more than $23? Shoppers agree. One person who gave them a five-star review wrote, "They look more expensive than they are and are comfortable and don't rub or cause blisters."

Best Strappy Sandals

Amazon Essentials Women's Casual Strappy Sandal ($24)

Amazon Essentials never disappoints with its selection of great basics, and these strappy sandals are no exception. They come in a bunch of different colors and can land on your doorstep as fast as a day or less with Prime.

Best Faux Leather Sandals

Fitory Women's Flat Sandals ($26, originally $39)

As one reviewer put it, these sandals are "resort-chic." They feature a cushioned insole and a faux leather crossband design, and they come in a handful of neutral colors.

Best Heeled Sandals

Dream Pairs Women's Chunk Low Heel Pump Sandals ($30, originally $39)

One of our editors wore these pumps to three weddings and hasn't stopped reaching for them since. They're surprisingly comfy, and the beige shade goes with everything. Learn more in our Dream Pairs Women's Chunk Low Heel Pump Sandals review.

Editor Quote: "Despite wearing them through two ceremonies, two receptions, and hours of questionable moves on the dance floor, they're still in pristine shape for my final summer wedding in a few weeks." - Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Casual Sandals

Teva Women's Olowahu Flip-Flop ($32, originally $34)

These Teva sandals are the definition of practical-cute. They're cushy enough for long days on your feet and arguably way cooler than your average Flip Flops.

Best Wedge Sandals

Crocs Brooklyn Low Wedge ($41)

Believe it or not, these are Crocs! The lightweight, low wedges come in tons of colors and manage to look stylish and feel ridiculously comfortable.

Marisa Petrarca is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has more than five years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. Her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, and InStyle, among others
